newsitem.title: USA: Stocks pulled down by sell-off in technology sector.
newsitem.headline: Stocks pulled down by sell-off in technology sector.

text.p: Stocks skidded Tuesday amid a sell-off in shares of recently high-flying technology companies.

Based on early and unofficial data, the Dow Jones industrial average closed 29.07 points lower, a loss of 0.48 percent, at 6,061.80. The high-technology laden Nasdaq Composite index plunged 16.53 points, or 1.34 percent, to 1,219.88.
In the broader market, declining issues led advances 15-9 on active volume of 414 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange.
